title: Gamify Your Life
description: Build the motivation and focus to get things done by making work fun. Leaderboards, to-do lists, daily quests, and more.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Make Work Fun App
description: Gamify your productivity tools and unlock multiplayer for personal development.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Party Quests
description: Quest together with comrades and compete together to slay your dragons in the Make Work Fun app.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Global Leaderboard
description: You don’t have to adventure alone. Get motivated by how your comrades are improving themselves everyday.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Make Pawgress
description: Help your furry friends level up and track their wins. Keep your data about your pets organized and in one place - while making it fun.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Be Intentional
description: Stay organized and ensure your efforts lead you to the success you want. Being intentional means always knowing the Why, What, and How behind everything you do. It's a life framework that helps you achieve your goals and find more meaning in your life.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Find Your Love
description: Be intentional in your search for your partner.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Discord Server
description: Meaningful asynchronous conversations in an online community forum.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Co-x3 Metaverse
description: A virtual space for comrades to co-work and hang out together.
author: Conrad Lin

title: L-CTRL System
description: Take back life control. Live a meaningful, intentional life while having fun.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Creator’s Toolkit
description: Find your voice and discover ways to share your creativity with the world.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Grow Wealth
description: Systematize saving and investing to streamline your financial health.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Grow Your Love
description: Level up your relationship by intentionally setting moments of reflection and meaningful communication.
author: Conrad Lin

title: LVL-UP Course
description: Learn how to visualize, plan, and execute on creating a better life. 4 week bootcamp.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Family Without Borders
description: Grow, learn, live with amazing people around the world. We value having a space where we can do our best work and progress together on our growth journey. You are the average of the 5 people you spend the most time with. Who do you want to be?
author: Conrad Lin

title: Mindfulness Practices
description: Let's create ways to reliably build inner peace in our lives, every day.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Co-x3 Retreats
description: We want to create an experience that enables people from around the world to have a dedicated learning experience for a specific book, mental model, or idea, and travel to a destination where they can tour the country and practice their learning together with a group.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Therapy With Co-x3
description: Meet with credentialled and experienced therapists who can help you with a range of issues including depression, anxiety, relationships, trauma, grief, and more.
author: Conrad Lin

title: How To Set Boundaries
description: Make the best use of your limited time in the world and train yourself, for yourself.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Accountability Partners
description: We can start building self-accountability by getting support from others.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Boundaries Workshop
description: Learn how to set good boundaries, negotiate for what feels comfortable, and lean into verbal and non verbal agreements.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Asking Good Questions
description: To truly learn about the world, we need to ask good questions.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Think Tank
description: We have a lot we’re curious about in the world, and we want a place to discuss these ideas.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Better Life AI Assistant
description: A GPT powered personal AI assistant that helps you reflect and plan your adventure based on your wins, habits, and other data from your productivity apps.
author: Conrad Lin

title: Co-x3 Family Council
description: Where individuals who have reached a high degree of awareness come together to steer the family with empathy and understanding.
author: Conrad Lin
